title: Big Tech needs us more than we need them
description: In the early 20th century, Karl Marx argued that power flows from owning the means of production — the stuff you need to make things, like land and factories and tools. This is no longer the case. Now, in the digital age, influence and wealth flow to the people who own the means of distribution...
